parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the cluster.

You can call the [ListClusters](~~87116~~) operation to query the cluster ID.

parameters.name: HostName
parameters.description: The name of the node. You can perform a fuzzy search. MySQL regular expressions are supported.

parameters.name: Role
parameters.description:
The type of the node. Valid values:

*   Manager: management node
*   Login: logon node
*   Compute: compute node

Default value: Compute.

parameters.name: Sequence
parameters.description:
The sorting method of the node list. Valid values:

*   Forward: sorts the nodes in chronological order.
*   Backward: sorts the nodes in reverse chronological order.

Default value: Forward.
